author: _.x.senpai.x._
content: Could anyone please explain how to  ourself generate Beacon State snappy files (pre and post) and STF operations for the same?

author: potuz
content: CL clients typically have tools for this except the snappy part perhaps. You can get SSZ files from the beacon API and then use their tools for the stf. In Prysm it's prysmctl. In Teku (or perhaps nimbus I may have them changed) it's pcli.

author: potuz
content: All CLs have such tools I think
